column4: when i try to connect to photobucket.com it shuts down my internet connection on karmic?
i'll try again in a couple days then.
it works on my mac, just not on my linux machine
well that's a bit odd in a way
not sure about that, but  if I remember correctly it's photobucket that don't support Linux properly anymore
well flickr and what not as alternatives
also maybe it's just at the moment you can't get on photobucket, but later on you can
it should work on Linux as well, but photobucket might have done something so  Linux users can't just go on it anymore
so that you can't go on webistes at all?
here's an idea little test, still got the Ubuntu Live CD?
ok so boot up the LIve CD, and go on photobucket and find out, if  you get the problem or not with that as well
if not,  maybe something has gone bad with your actsaul install,  which might of happended, but not that likely
you can set up wireless on the Live CD
